div.p: Relationship between the actual climate sensitivities (i.e., actual climate sensitivity = 1.5, 3.0, 3.65, or 4.5 °C) and temperature increase in 2100. The relationship and regression line are shown for the business-as-usual (plus and black line), T15 (triangle and blue line), T20 (circle and red line), and T25 (square and cyan line) scenarios
